name: Croagunk

evolution.description: Croagunk can evolve into Toxicroak at level 10 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 15 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Toxic Mouth Pokémon. Its cheeks hold poison sacs. It tries to catch foes off guard to jab them with toxic fingers.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.description: When this Pokémon enters the battle, an opponent must reveal if it has a move that the Pokémon is vulnerable to. The move itself does not have to be revealed, only that there is such a move.

abilities.name: Dry Skin
abilities.description: At the end of each of this Pokémon's turns, it takes an amount of damage equal to its proficiency modifier in harsh sunlight, or heals for the same amount during rain.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.description: On melee attacks made by this Pokémon, roll a d10 on a hit. On a result of a 10, the target is poisoned.
